page.title: 03LIVING IN N.SCARLE PLOTS
page.content: I like living in the plots of North Scarle because it is very quiet and not many people disturb you when you are playing.There are no thugs at all. There are no vandals or thieves.There are qiute a lot of rubbish dumps where you can search for old toys.There are quite a lot of B.M.X.tracks.There are not as many in the town.You would have to go to five shops to get five things in a town and in a village you can go to one shop to get five things. Sometimes the people from the town come to the countryside for a change of scenery because they have not got any beast,sheep or wildlife in the city.
